column5: Finally heading up to LOW this weekend via Baudette/Rainy River. Is there a grocery store in Rainy River? Went through there a couple of years ago and could not locate one. Need to find a place to stock up on some tators to go with that fresh walleye shore lunch! Thanks.
Take 'em from home. No problem if they're in a sealed bag showing the source.

There is a Grocery Store in Rainy River. It is on the south side of the main road at the east end of town. JayM5209 is right about the potatoes. You can bring them with you from the States with the restrictions he mentioned. Marv
The name of the grocery store is Beaver Mills
